short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows a QR code of your current browser location, so that you can scan it on your mobile.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This will show QR code for the URL in address bar so that users can scan the QR code in Mobile and open it in mobile browser without typing again in mobile browser's address bar.

This was a 7 year old idea but it is getting published today.
